titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Environmental Protection Agency, State and Tribal Assistance Grants, Environmental Information Exchange Network for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Environmental Protection Agency, State and Tribal Assistance Grants, Environmental Information Exchange Network for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment, Manufacturing, and Critical Materials.

bill.summary: This bill specifies that no FY2024 funding is authorized to be appropriated or made available for the Environmental Protection Agency's Environmental Information Exchange Network.
